patthana14.21:1.1_0: Sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.21:2.1_0: Anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.21:3.1_0: Sārammaṇañca anārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
